name: Trash Dash (GgameM)
description:
The street animals needs your help!

Their family is running low on food, but there's a solution! People left fish for them on the streets!

Help them catch as many as possible in this fun infinity scenery!

Play as Dan, the cat, or Ned, the racoon, and dash through this fun endless run catching fish as you go, but beware the obstacles on the way.

PC Controls:

  • Arrows - Moves
  • Mouse - Menu interactions
